events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position; thank you for your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your software developer experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your file to guide you through the upcoming steps in the engineering hiring process.
The initial screening went well, and we found your software development skills align with our engineering requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to the screening questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior engineering panel for next Wednesday at 10 AM UTC.
